original_text: I will make an agreement with them, that I will give them peace. I will remove the dangerous wild animals from the land. Then they can live there safely, even in the wilderness. They will not be afraid when they sleep in the forests.
korean_text: 내가 또 그들과 화평의 언약을 맺고 악한 짐승을 그 땅에서 그치게 하리니 그들이 빈 들에 평안히 거하며 수풀 가운데에서 잘지라

sentences.original_text: I will make an agreement with them
that I will give them peace
I will remove the dangerous wild animals
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 위험한 야생 동물들을 제거할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then they can live there safely
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 거기서 안전하게 살 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: when they sleep in the forests
